title: Covid-19 Vaccine Basics
content:
side effects after COVID-19 vaccination
, like pain or swelling at the injection site, a headache, chills, or fever. These reactions are common and are normal signs that your body is building protection.
Reports of serious adverse events after vaccination are
rare
.
